cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_portc to 99999 (exceeding valid port range) will cause invalid F1 interface configuration and connection failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting prach_ConfigurationIndex to 999 (invalid value) will cause invalid PRACH configuration and RACH procedure failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 prach_ConfigurationIndex 設定為 999（無效值）會導致無效的 PRACH 配置和 RACH 程序失敗。
